text: Bellows Falls is an incorporated village located in the town of Rockingham in Windham County, Vermont, United States. The population was 2,747 at the 2020 census. Bellows Falls is home to the Green Mountain Railroad; the annual Roots on the River Festival;"Roots on the River" Vermont Festivals and the No Film Film Festival.No Film Film Festival Facebook ==References== Category:Villages in Vermont
title: Bellows Falls, Vermont
